requirement: The Security Rule requires appropriate administrative safeguards to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and security of electronic protected health information.
title: Administrative Safeguards for ePHI
description: Implement administrative safeguards to protect electronic protected health information (ePHI).
testing_procedures: Review policies and procedures for administrative safeguards.
Verify implementation of administrative controls through interviews and documentation review.
remediation:
Establish and enforce administrative safeguards for ePHI.
Develop and document administrative policies and procedures.
Train staff on administrative safeguards.
Regularly review and update administrative controls.

requirement: The Security Rule requires appropriate physical safeguards to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and security of electronic protected health information.
title: Physical Safeguards for ePHI
description: Implement physical safeguards to protect electronic protected health information (ePHI).
testing_procedures: Inspect physical security measures in place.
Verify access controls to physical locations where ePHI is stored.
remediation:
Implement and maintain physical safeguards for ePHI.
Install physical access controls such as locks and security systems.
Restrict physical access to authorized personnel only.
Regularly review and update physical security measures.

requirement: The Security Rule requires appropriate technical safeguards to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and security of electronic protected health information.
title: Technical Safeguards for ePHI
description: Implement technical safeguards to protect electronic protected health information (ePHI).
testing_procedures: Review technical security measures in place.
Test access controls and encryption methods used for ePHI.
remediation:
Implement and maintain technical safeguards for ePHI.
Deploy encryption for data at rest and in transit.
Implement access controls and authentication mechanisms.
Regularly test and update technical security measures.
